name: Music_5334.wav
keywords: ['steel pedal guitar', 'hawaiian', 'soft rock ballad', 'synth string section', 'tight drum kit', 'relaxed', 'laid back']
caption: The music is a soft rock ballad with Hawaiian sounds. The melody is driven by a gliding steel pedal guitar. In the background a synth string section can be heard sustaining chords creating a relaxed ambience. The atmosphere of the song is easy going and relaxed. This is a song you would hear at a hotel lobby in Hawaii.
